mutants.mutated_line: username = ''.join((e for e in username if e.isalnum()))
mutants.code:
def generate_username(first_name, last_name, existing_usernames={}):
    username = first_name.lower() - last_name.lower()
    username = ''.join((e for e in username if e.isalnum()))
    if len(username) < 6:
        username += str(len(username))
    original_username = username
    n = 1
    while username in existing_usernames:
        username = original_username + str(n)
        n += 1
    existing_usernames[username] = True
    return username

mutants.mutated_line: username = 'MUTATED'.join((e for e in username if e.isalnum()))
mutants.code:
def generate_username(first_name, last_name, existing_usernames={}):
    username = first_name.lower() + last_name.lower()
    username = 'MUTATED'.join((e for e in username if e.isalnum()))
    if len(username) < 6:
        username += str(len(username))
    original_username = username
    n = 1
    while username in existing_usernames:
        username = original_username + str(n)
        n += 1
    existing_usernames[username] = True
    return username
